array.name: poetry
array.item: Hold fast to dreams \n紧紧抓住梦想，
For if dreams die \n梦想若是消亡
Life is a broken-winged bird \n生命就象鸟儿折了翅膀
That can never fly. \n再也不能飞翔
Hold fast to dreams \n紧紧抓住梦想，
For when dreams go \n梦想若是消丧
Life is a barren field \n生命就象贫瘠的荒野，
Frozen only with snow v \n雪覆冰封，万物不再生
The world in the morning to get everything \n世界在清晨获取万物
And you lose the world in the early morning \n而你在清晨失去世界
Don\'t let the early morning and then go \n不要让清晨随之而去
